column4: hi guys..  i really could use some help.  my laptop is running karmic and it wont load up.  i did a fresh install of karmic today and it worked for a few hours but i just used the update manager and after the required restart, it wont  finish loading..  it stops on black screen with 2 lines of white text that says /dev/sda1: clean, 130994/2351104 files, 7790779400025 blocks on the first line...
...and /dev/sda1: clean, 130994/2351104 files, 7790779400025 blocks on the second
any help would be much appreciated
sounds like something is wrong with your harddrive, i'm not good with linux
